attributes.action: Create a new convention, and undertake the wearing of a specially designed hat at all times in public life, to signify his/her role in society and stop potential confusion that could arise without clarification by wearing such headware
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is very important. How many times a day do you get mistaken for the Prime Minister?

Let's once and for all end this embarrassing occurance, by petitioning the Prime Minister to wear a hat which would identify him/her as the rightful owner of the title Prime Minister.

A competition could be held to design such piece of headware, although I prefer myself a very small Breton cap which could be worn, just through the powers of balance upon the head.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
